for Staff and Students

div.div: Lowndes County Schools are committed to the students, families, and communities served. Join us as we build a strong foundation and nurture successful learners.

div.br: Provide a superior educational system that challenges all students to attain their greatest intellectual, social, and personal potential.

article.aria-label: The screening that was scheduled for the Title I Pre-K Program will be delayed until further notification.

h3.a: The screening that was scheduled for the Title I Pre-K Program will be delayed until further notification.

div.div: The screening that was scheduled for the Title I Pre-K Program will be delayed until further notification. If you submitted an application for this program, you will be contacted by phone for a screening appointment date and time when school resumes. The Title I Pre-K application deadline will be extended. A new due date will be determined when school resumes. If your child was scheduled for MERIT testing on one of the scheduled Saturdays, this testing will be rescheduled at a later date. You will be contacted when school resumes to reschedule.
LCSD will follow Governor Reeves’ action to close schools for the remaining school year.

article.aria-label: We are now taking Title 1 Pre-K Applications!

h3.a: We are now taking Title 1 Pre-K Applications!
